name: StormAmbiance
0:
”Alexa open storm ambiance”
”Alexa ask storm ambiance to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: storm ambiance
des: Discover the calming essence of nature with Storm Ambiance, designed to bring peace and serenity into your life. Whether you need to relax after a hectic day, enhance your meditation, or create a peaceful workspace, this skill offers the perfect background sounds. Scientifically crafted to aid in relaxation, focus, and sleep, Storm Ambiance is your go-to solution for a tranquil and restful experience. \n\nAll you need to do is say Alexa start Storm Ambiance, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
